_description: ‘Cusse hym not to ofte’ — three short couplets

CamStJohn135.Transcription:
Beware of þe holow trethat it be gyle not þethow
                    þe Cuppe be wyteAnd þe Ale louelykThe Ale gothe down
                    softeCusse hym not to ofte
CamStJohn135.Note:
Added to last front flyleaf by a hand of the fifteenth
                    century.
